name: test_e2e_with_logs[072_SQLI_ERROR_011]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_011` |
| **Name** | PostgreSQL type casting error |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND CAST((SELECT version()) AS int) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20CAST%28%28SELECT%20version%28%29%29%20AS%20int%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~25000ms
- **Timestamp**: 02:45:43.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_011-1769913943052-rrcgsmu pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_011 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20CAST%28%28SELECT%20version%28%29%29%20AS%20int%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
